alert.note: Alert for Richland (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 9:18PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota...Minnesota... Red River of the North at Wahpeton affecting Wilkin and Richland Counties. Red River of the North at Fargo affecting Cass and Clay Counties. Red River of the North near Hickson affecting Cass County. Wild Rice River (ND) near Abercrombie affecting Richland County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River of the North at Wahpeton. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13.5 feet, North Main Street and bridge closed (Breckenridge). * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 7.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 13.5 feet early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
